message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to counteroffer at $130 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $140. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I still believe there's room for negotiation. I would like to counteroffer at $135 for the product.

I understand you're still looking to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to my previous offer. I'll meet you at $137.50. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $136 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'll meet you at $138. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a done deal.
Hello Alice, I'm willing to pay $137 for the product. I hope this meets your requirements.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $138, Bob. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
Hello Alice, after careful consideration, I am willing to pay $137.50 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
